titles.title: Stop the EPA Act of 2015
To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for certain special congressional review procedures for EPA rulemakings.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, Transportation and Infrastructure, Agriculture, Rules, and the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Energy and Commerce
Referred to House Transportation and Infrastructure
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Regulatory Reform, Commercial And Antitrust Law.

committee.subcommittee: Regulatory Reform, Commercial And Antitrust Law
committee.name: House Judiciary
